title: The Leftover Woman’s Big Marriage, the CEO’s Favorite Darling - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Cold Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Wealthy Characters
author: 土豆爱西红柿
description:
After three years of love, Lin Xihe learned that her lover was actually a married man.

She fled in a panic, accidentally bumping into the wealthiest man in Yang Cheng, Pei Yi Heng.>
